Sister Mi pretends to not know how to ice skate so that Ping Pong will hold her. Li E is happy that her plan succeeded. Li E shows off her skating skills and accidentally broke her leg. Xin Xin feels depressed and said that Li E fell down on purpose so that people will care for her and does not want to move out. Li E became angry and decided to move to Centenarian Home.

programme.title: Old Is Gold - EP 74
programme.desc: Li E decided to move into Centenarian Home and Xin Xin is obliged to bring her around to familiarise with the environment. programme.title: A Conversation with Minister 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: Minister for Manpower, Dr Tan See Leng is truly a foodie! In this episode, host Joanne Peh joins him on a gastronomical journey. Despite living to eat, his family could only afford simple fare when he was young. He eventually worked hard to become a doctor but regrets not being able to treat his parents' illnesses. How has his experience influenced his outlook on life and policies?

programme.title: Coded Love - EP 13

Meanwhile, holographic Si Yu, learning that Dr. G took the other set of ear implants, decided to self-destruct...

programme.title: Destined - EP 8

At first, Gu Jiu Si does not like Liu Yu Ru, believing her to be calculating and scheming.

programme.title: Savoury Taiwan S2 - EP 1

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Live 2022 Part 2 - EP 3

programme.title: Ring! Ring! Ringgit! - EP 12

programme.title: Makan - EP 4

programme.title: Si Cilik Licik - EP 20

programme.title: 123 Glamour - EP 7

programme.title: Anamika - Thriller Serial

programme.title: MALAR
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.desc: Unable to return her brother's monetary favour, Meenakshi's husband ends his life. When her brother's wife expects her to repay the money, Meenakshi sees it as a chance to reclaim her lost honour.

programme.desc: "Maari" is the story of a simple village girl Maari, who is blessed with the power of premonition. This extra supernatural power doesn’t make her a super human but in turn she is victimised for it. The story takes a turn when she marries Surya under an unexpected circumstance and becomes his saviour

programme.title: Ninaithean Vandhai - EP 215
programme.desc: A Tale of Love, Family and parenthood where a widowed father - grieving over his soulmate, falls in love with a young girl who becomes the caretaker of his children

programme.title: Nenjathai Killadhe - EP 96
programme.desc: Goutham, a business tycoon who appears overweight, enters into a marriage of convenience with Bhoomika, an educated middle-class woman. Both have surpassed the typical age for marriage and share similar kinds of emotional pain. Will this couple develop feelings for each other and forge a life together as husband and wife?

programme.title: Anna - EP 513
programme.desc: Story of an eldest brother who aims to get all his 4 sisters married but soon realizes that the ultimate destination for a girl isn’t marriage but understands that their dreams/goals are just as important and strives to help them achieve it.

programme.title: Karthigai Dheepam - EP 655
programme.desc: The story of a dark-skinned woman, who is an extremely talented singer. How she marries man who helps her in becoming a music sensation, surpassing the regular standards of beauty and achieving success based on sheer talent.

programme.title: Valliyin Velan - EP 46
programme.desc: The story primarily follows Roopa's journey as she grapples with her politician father's rejection, but finds solace and support in Raju, her father’s most trustworthy PA and their protector. Despite deception from the manipulative schemes of her aunt, Ambika, Roopa strives to safeguard her family's legacy while unexpectedly falling for Raju along the way.

programme.title: Sandhya Raagam - EP 363
programme.desc: Sandhya Raagam is a story of sisterhood that explores the relationship between two cousins, Maya and Dhanalakshmi who share a close bond. How they navigate through various challenges and support each other through the joys and sorrows of life forms the crux of the story.

programme.title: Idhayam - EP 432
programme.desc: Story of Two people who are intertwind at heart embracinfg the second chance at life that has been given to them with a sense of hope and passion for life.

It's the end of a relentless, fruitful and highly-publicised rivalry, played out in the world's most prestigious opera houses throughout the 1950s. Account and personal stories.

programme.desc: Southern Ardeche, from its hills to the banks of its famous river. Join Laurent Guillaume to discover a veritable lifestyle ''Made in Ardeche''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1467
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Einstein - EP 13
programme.desc: In August 2023 a broken wheel on a freight train caused considerable damage to the Gotthard base tunnel. The clean-up alone took several weeks and since then the tunnel has been under reconstruction. How can we prevent this type of accident from recurring?

programme.title: Megastructures Romaines En Gaule - EP 3
programme.desc: With its 2,185 monuments, Paris is a world tourism capital. The City of Light also shelters ruins that bear witness to the Gallo-Roman period: a few metres from Place Monge, the Arena of Lutetia is amongst the oldest remains from these ancient times, along with the Cluny thermal baths.

But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Einstein - EP 13
programme.desc: In August 2023 a broken wheel on a freight train caused considerable damage to the Gotthard base tunnel. The clean-up alone took several weeks and since then the tunnel has been under reconstruction. How can we prevent this type of accident from recurring?

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 2
programme.desc: Southern Ardeche, from its hills to the banks of its famous river. An excursion by mountain bike through the uplands and slackline opposite the Cirque des Gens, plus exploring its gastronomy with local produce and wild plants. Join Laurent Guillaume to discover a veritable lifestyle ''Made in Ardeche''.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 19
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 20
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. He might be mischievous but he has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 5
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 7
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicky's worried she's made a big mistake after confronting Dahlia. A situation guaranteed to add to the stress which Leo tries to control by following the advice from his new psychologist!

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024 - EP 6
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Mamma En Chef - EP 6
programme.desc: With his bag of pita bread, Erich has made a long journey by motorbike to visit Siham, who's arrived straight from Lebanon. Today we discover molokhia with Lebanese-style stuffed aubergines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1468
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 5
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Les Chevaliers Blancs
programme.desc: Jacques, an NGO president, convinces 300 French families hoping to adopt a child to finance a plan to rescue war orphans. He has one month to get the children out. To succeed, he conceals his true plans and convinces the African authorities that he is looking to open an orphanage.

programme.title: A Trois
programme.desc: Julien visits his 6 year-old daughter Clea, whom he hasn't seen for a long time. As she does all she can to attract his attention, Julien is more interested in getting closer to Lucie, Clea's mother, so the three of them can all live together again.

programme.title: L'oeil Du Cyclone - EP 10
programme.desc: Everyone has their own little secrets. But what Louise has to announce to her daughters is more like a bombshell!

programme.title: L'oeil Du Cyclone - EP 11
programme.desc: Isabelle and eliane meet Michel, Louise's lover. Emma gives herself the task of investigating this newcomer.

programme.title: L'oeil Du Cyclone - EP 12
programme.desc: Isabelle tries to comfort eliane, still heart-broken over Benoit. Meanwhile, Mylene pays Isabelle an unexpected visit.

programme.title: L'oeil Du Cyclone - EP 13
programme.desc: It's the big day as Jade leaves for the Gaspe Peninsula. Isabelle takes advantage of the moment to clear the air with Jean-Francois and avoid any possible misunderstanding.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Flashs
programme.desc: Seven year-old Judith has been kidnapped. Mathilde heads the investigation with her new team. When the prime suspect is arrested, Mathilde is flabbergasted: it's none other than her mother, to whom she hasn't spoken in months. Claiming to be a medium, her mother says she's had visions concerning the case.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 22
programme.desc: The French may be travelling more, but not in the same way as before: Eluxtravel offers made-to-measure experiences. All about the French expression ''faire greve'' (to go on strike). Moulins, in the Allier, is renowned for its artisanal glass and textile production. Wearing a headscarf on the catwalk.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 9
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, ''400 millions de critiques'' (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Megastructures Romaines En Gaule - EP 2
programme.desc: During the conquest of Gaul, entire cities rallied the Roman cause without fighting, even enjoying the largesse of the emperors. A Unesco World Heritage site, Arles still bears witness to this past era: its amphitheatre a replica of the Coliseum, its circus one of the best known in Gaul.

programme.title: La Nuit Americaine
programme.desc: A special US presidential election edition.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Les Saisons De Pique-Assiette - EP 5
programme.desc: Citrus desserts are in the limelight! On the menu: orange-flavoured pudding and lime-flavoured madeleines.

programme.title: Edition Speciale Election Americaine
programme.desc: A special US presidential election edition.

programme.title: Le Jardin Extraordinaire - EP 1
programme.desc: Surrounded by scientific advisers and commentators, Tanguy Dumortier covers the natural world and the environment through reports and unpublished documents.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge - EP 3
programme.desc: In today's programme: the vineyards at the Chateau de Bousval; the chocolate makers Thibaut Legast, Patricia Forero and Louise Gerard; the singer and actress Marie Verhulst; Belgium in the news; Latitude 50, the circus and street arts...

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 21

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 7

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.title: Temps Present - EP 9
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Meurtres A Pont-L'eveque
programme.desc: Judge Daniel is found hanging in the former Pont-L'eveque prison. Julien and Franck Roussel, two brothers with a long-standing grudge, are forced to work together on an investigation that takes them back to the origins of their dissension when they both loved the same woman, Marion Letellier, the victim's clerk.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 21
programme.desc: The Villele Museum covers the history of Reunion Island and of slavery in the 18th century. From minuscule to immense, Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and assembles, plunging us into a different dimension. Marine Serre: the 2025 spring-summer collection, veritable message of love. Severine and Christophe, manufacturing Basque knives.

programme.title: L'heritage Badouri
programme.desc: Accompanied by his father Mohamed, the Quebec actor and humorist Rachid Badouri returns to Morocco in search of his roots. From Tangiers to Hadria in the Rif Mountains, he gradually pieces together his identity: a father-son journey filled with laughter and emotion, for an immersive view of Berber culture.

programme.title: Movie - Ninaithen Vanthai
programme.desc: A musician dreams of a beautiful girl and sets out to find her. Soon after, he meets her at a wedding, but by that time his father has already fixed his marriage with someone else.

programme.title: Movie - Adaikalam
programme.desc: A father has to suffer the humiliation of being away from his children and eventually being an object of their anger. But this changes once the children discover the truth about their father.

programme.title: Movie - Nanda Nanditha
programme.desc: Nanda (Hemachandran) is thrown out of his home by his drunkard dad. He falls in love with Nanditha (Meghna). He then agrees to kill a political candidate, Knockout Chandran (Shanmugaraja). Does he succeed in his job? Does he unite with Nanditha?

programme.title: Movie - Manu Needhi

programme.title: Movie - Annai Kalikambal

programme.title: Movie - Athiradi Vettai

programme.title: Movie - Aadukalam
programme.desc: Pettaikaaran is famous in his town for an impeccable track record of successes in rooster fights. When one of his aides, Karuppu, goes against his word in a fight, it leads to an enmity between them

programme.title: Movie - Drohi
programme.desc: Karuna kills the man who murdered his school teacher. However, when Sami, his best friend, informs the police that Karuna killed the gangster, differences arise and the two grow to hate each other.

programme.title: Movie - Nattai Thirudathe
programme.desc: Movie starring Janakaraj, Sumitra, Y G Mahendran and directed by Senthilnathan.

programme.title: Movie - Jodi

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 12
programme.desc: Born into a football-loving family in Senegal, Pape Matar Sarr was destined for a life in the game. Despite being linked with Barcelona at a young age, Sarr made his name at Metz before joining Tottenham Hotspur. This week The Big Interview learns how those moves came about, how computer science has helped him understand his role on the pitch and how a passion for Formula 1 keeps him entertained off the pitch.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 12
programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Ulrik Bokeme vs Hicham El Gaoui
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features main event Hicham El Gaoui of Morrocco as he looks to ruin the Congo's Ulrik Bokeme's perfect record.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. The fight took place at the Home Depot Center in Carson, California, USA, on May 8, 2010.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 66
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are about to go on the Tubby Custard Ride with the hat, bag, ball and scooter when they realise there is not enough room. The Noo-Noo looks after their things.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'crab', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today we see different crabs that can walk sideways, hide, have big claws or are colourful.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Zip thinks Phoebe could be a superhero, so they craft some awesome superhero cuffs.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Messy gets to fly Mayor Oki's plane, but he crash-lands it in a tree! Luckily, robots fly to the rescue.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 66
programme.desc: Monty and his best friend pet pig Jimmy Jones dance and sing to a song about creatures who seem to know it all.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Glitch visits Rome to race his Grimbots in the Colosseum. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: What goes up must come down! Grandmaster Glitch lands with a splash in Lake Titicaca in South America.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 49
programme.desc: Dad tells Bluey to mind her manners at the table - they're not animals. But when Bluey gets her hands on a stick of magic asparagus, she shows them everyone's got a wild side.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: When Andy mistakenly eats a bowl of exotic fruit salad that Mr Hammond left for the black crested macaques, Andy jets off to Sulawesi in search of more.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how waterlilies play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 24
programme.desc: In this special compilation episode, Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments. We will see her silliest songs, most marvellous moments and messiest slops.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: After a long walk the squirrels are starting to get tired, a song will help them get home.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 44

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 24

With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 25

Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: Noddy's back on the case when something goes wrong with Smartysaurus's rainbow experiment . He needs to investigate. He figures out that the rainbow colours have all been put in a different order. Using his investigation kit and all his who, what, why, where, when and how questions he e follows all the clues - which leads him eventually to Fuse's workshop. Fuse admits that he changed the order of the rainbow test tubes from colour to size order.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all.

Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22

But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 6

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 22

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 75

While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp it’s a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When Tag worries that she's no longer a "Go" dog, Lady Lydia helps her find a new persona by helping Tag try on a bunch of different hats. Luckily, when a runaway puppy needs to be wrangled, and only the speedy Tag can catch him, Tag realizes she was a Go dog all along. \ Sergeant Pooch reads Scooch, Tag and Kit a story book during their sleepover. But when the last pages are missing, the three kids work together to make up their own ending to the story.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.desc: When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 11

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslina Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Join Haslinda Amin as she explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The tiny former Soviet nation of Kyrgyzstan hopes to join the global tech economy; we hang out with blockbuster YouTube success D-Billions and learn about a darker side of its society.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Our journey through Kyrgyzstan continues as we get to know the ambitious young women behind a coding army that might one day lead a local tech revolution.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: We look at the innovative manufacturing companies finding new ways to make modern marvels, from robots that can do detailed metalworking to a machine that can 3D print on a massive scale.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: In Part two, we dive deep into LA's burgeoning space industry, one that's been supercharged by talented veterans of SpaceX.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Best-selling author Ashlee Vance travels the world to engage with the most brilliant, audacious and controversial pioneers in science and technology.

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 1

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Mathematician and Author Hannah Fry explores the powerful new technologies set to shape society, and whether that future is one that we want. Our future doesn't just happen, we make it.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Travel Track
programme.desc: Travel Track, a series of honest-to-goodness, self-guided trips in Korea's hidden travel destination. Four individuals with fantastic chemistry from a team to experience and introduce each destination's local experiences, cuisine, and attractions.

programme.title: Travel Agency 2
programme.desc: Global content creators from all around the world will create a brand new map, introducing every inch of Korea. The lively energy and vivid reactions shown by our Creators will let you feel like you are actualy eating, seeing, and experiencing the dynamic regional wonders. Also, these Creators will broadcast and share their trip LIVE in their individual channels.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 37
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Local Exquisite Omusubi: Special Collaboration with Drama Serial "Omusubi"
programme.desc: A show introducing a variety of omusubi (rice balls) from different regions of Japan collaborates with the drama serial "Omusubi"! MC Iio Kazuki sneaks into the filming site to find out which rice balls the cast members love most and uncovers the secrets behind the delicious ones featured in the drama. It’s 29 minutes packed with everything omusubi!

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Classroom Across the Universe" Eps. 5
programme.desc: The story is set in a part-time high school in Shinjuku, Tokyo, where students of different ages and backgrounds, each with diverse circumstances, attend. Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "Me and Future Me !?" Eps. 18
programme.desc: Igarashi Raito (Tsuna Keito), a municipal worker for 10 years, has lived a stable life under constant pressure to avoid making mistakes in a society where a misstep could trigger a public backlash. One day, a man claiming to be Raito himself and saying he has come from the future, suddenly appears. The man predicts events in Raito’s future one after another―his dreams, work, friendships, relationships, marriage, and family.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 38
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Night Drama Serial "Me and Future Me !?" Eps. 19
programme.desc: Igarashi Raito (Tsuna Keito), a municipal worker for 10 years, has lived a stable life under constant pressure to avoid making mistakes in a society where a misstep could trigger a public backlash. One day, a man claiming to be Raito himself and saying he has come from the future, suddenly appears. The man predicts events in Raito’s future one after another―his dreams, work, friendships, relationships, marriage, and family.

programme.title: tiny desk concerts JAPAN
programme.desc: All you need is a small desk and musical instruments. NHK is launching a Japanese version of the worldwide phenomenon "tiny desk concerts," originally pioneered by American public broadcaster NPR. Set in the actual offices of NHK, the series will breathe new life into music as artists perform in a setting that is anything but ordinary.

programme.desc: In this season, the show takes a fresh twist by inviting 34 diverse guests, who are divided into the Older Brothers and Younger Brothers teams. Get ready for intense music battles, vibrant stage acts, and a blend of camaraderie and competition among the brothers, all shining brightly!

programme.title: Hot Door Night 27 - EP 34
programme.desc: Catch all the fun and laughter right here as we bring you Taiwan's top-grossing variety entertainment show that will keep you wanting for more!

programme.title: Brutally Young - EP 15
programme.desc: 18 years ago, a group of seven students were involved in the death of a gangster, later burying him in the woods. Today as adults, each of them walk their own path and professions, but the discovery of the bones belonging to their former classmate forces them to reunite and find a way to keep the police from knowing their secret.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentlemen - EP 17
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 2 - EP 5
programme.desc: With the crown of thorns and the robe of thorns, the brothers shine again on the big stage without fear of hardship!

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 8 - EP 6
programme.desc: This season, the show ventures to Fondation Monet in Giverny, France, with inventive Olympic and Chinese fashion-themed dishes. Unearth new food stories in France's beautiful villages.

programme.title: Flight To You - EP 33
programme.desc: The story follows an aspiring civil aviation pilot struggling to work with her cold and strict captain due to personality clashes. While experiencing several life-threatening aviation incidents, they learn to work together and grow to value each other.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 33
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: My Pet My Angel - EP 14
programme.desc: Veterinarian Gam Wai Ting work with science and rules. Her neighbor Wong Sing Yan is an animal mind reader, who diagnoses and treats pets by understanding owners' psychology. Can these two enemies save pets together?

programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1815
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V - EP 1
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V - EP 2
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1616
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 1
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 6
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Legend of the Condor Heroes (I), The - EP 16
programme.desc: This costume Kung -fu-packed serialized drama is an authentic adaptation of the most selling Kung-fu novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long-series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these evolves around individual story lines and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they form a coherent whole._x000D_The story is set in the Sung Dynasty, when the KAM and YEUN monarchy are both invading South._x000D_YEUNG and KWOK are two sworn brothers.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 80
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Anti-Crime Squad - EP 12
programme.desc: HEY (Ng Ngai Cheung) is a member of the Anti-crime Squad. Being a stubborn man with determination to fight crime, he never gives way to criminals. He is so competent that he has solved many difficult cases. However he is not good at working with others and his strong character has laid an iron curtain between he and his colleagues. He is not accepted by his Supervisor FAN (Lai Yiu Cheung) and new partner HONG (Chan Ho Man, Benny). Being unable to hind support, HEY wants to quit his job.
